data.name: Kids Group
data.description: Our church is dedicated to teaching our little ones the truth about Jesus Christ. They are taught the basic principles of the bible, the stories from the beginning, until the birth of Jesus Christ so that they will be equipped when God calls them to the ministry.

data.name: Youth Group
data.description: Join our youth department "Apostolic Crew" as they embark on their journey toward the truth, to learn more about Jesus Christ, the baptism of the water and the spirit, the refilling of the Holy Ghost by the evidence of speaking in tounges.

data.name: Ladies Group
data.description: Come and have fellowship with our ladies' department to help the family serve God. They help to guide the youth and children to grow maturely in the presence of God.

data.name: Mens Group
data.description: Be a part of our men's department as they lead, guide, and teach the youth and childrens to be faithful to God. He must manage his own household well, with all dignity keeping his children submissive. (1 Timothy 3:4-5)
